boardgame.name: Arcadia Quest: Inferno
Arcadia Quest: Infierno
boardgame.description: Inferno is a standalone expansion to Arcadia Quest. It is 100% compatible with the original base game and introduces four new Guilds: Sharks, Tigers, Crows, and Serpents. It features new types of heroes, such as Alchemists and Gladiators._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There is a new branching campaign system, and the storyline revolves around the guilds descending into a fiery abyss. There are Brimstone cards that make the terrain risky to navigate, which operate similarly to the Tombstone cards from Arcadia Quest: Beyond the Grave._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A new mechanism called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Damnation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; will tempt the heroes with powerful weapons that can corrupt the characters over time or change the behavior of nearby monsters. There are also Angels, which are allied characters for the heroes to rescue, escort or assist. Working with the Angels can affect the branching campaign path system and even allow the player to recruit them for use in later missions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

This is a pre-order for CMON_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Arcadia Quest: Inferno Hell-of-a-Pledge ($440 retail value), plus the Arcadia Quest: Pets addon ($60 MSRP), from the Kickstarter. Items are expected to arrive February 2017. Note: I will cover up to the first $20 of shipping costs. I will provide a shipping quote (likely via UPS as this may be multiple large packages) when the items arrive to me, and will immediately ship to you once shipping payment is received. Ships from Falls Church, VA (22042) via lowest-cost insurable option of USPS, UPS, or FedEx. I have a mail scale and purchase postage digitally. I am able to offer local pickup on weekends in Falls Church and Arlington, VA (infant + job limits my availability and travel options). Note the number of exclusives this includes, including the 3-heady Cerby pet from the Pets addon! Core box includes: 36 highly detailed figures, including: 12 Hero figures 5 Angel figures 19 Monster figures (6x Demoness, 6x Harpy, 2x Demon Pitcher, 2x Cerberus, Belly_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;aal, The Judge, The Underlord) 12 color plastic bases 8 Attack dice 6 Defense dice 9 double-sided game tiles 4 guild dashboards 276 cards 300+ tokens Campaign Sheet pad Rulebook Campaign Book KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVES: The only way to get these was to pledge for the original campaign. They will never be released again! Miscellaneous: Arcadia dice bag - Kickstarter Exclusive! The fall of arcadia campaign 20 wounds tokens 24 death tokens 30 plastic coins 16 guild tokens Guild dices 30 damnation token Heroes: King David III - Kickstarter Exclusive! Lucas - Kickstarter Exclusive! Annika - Kickstarter Exclusive! Lord Tyron - Kickstarter Exclusive! Tigris - Kickstarter Exclusive! Tao - Kickstarter Exclusive! Dris - Kickstarter Exclusive! Gabriel - Kickstarter Exclusive! Thornwood - Kickstarter Exclusive! Johnny - Kickstarter Exclusive! Sarya - Kickstarter Exclusive! Kragor - Kickstarter Exclusive! Mercury - Kickstarter Exclusive! Tyrek - Kickstarter Exclusive! Tyndall - Kickstarter Exclusive! Master pim - Kickstarter Exclusive! Raven - Kickstarter Exclusive! Hellen - Kickstarter Exclusive! Sir Bryce - Kickstarter Exclusive! Magu - Kickstarter Exclusive! PapaRuk - Kickstarter Exclusive! Vexia - Kickstarter Exclusive! Julie - Kickstarter Exclusive! Annabelle - Kickstarter Exclusive! Britney - Kickstarter Exclusive! Wanda - Kickstarter Exclusive! Rivet - Kickstarter Exclusive! Hell of a box! - Kickstarter Exclusive! (to store all KS heroes) Monsters: Poison dragon exclusive expansion set - Kickstarter Exclusive! Whole lotta lava side quest box Demon Captains - Kickstarter Exclusive! Hellen - Kickstarter Exclusive! Kragor - Kickstarter Exclusive! Hell cats Ignos The fallen angel Pets: Nixon - Kickstarter Exclusive! Bones - Kickstarter Exclusive! Gadget - Kickstarter Exclusive! Biru - Kickstarter Exclusive! Scrag - Kickstarter Exclusive! Owlbunny - Kickstarter Exclusive!

Inferno is a standalone expansion to Arcadia Quest. It is 100% compatible with the original base game and introduces four new Guilds: Sharks, Tigers, Crows, and Serpents. It will feature new types of heroes, such as Alchemists and Gladiators. This is the complete _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Hell of a Pledge_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Kickstarter edition: - Core box - Hell of a box (SGs and KS exclusives + printed Fall of Arcadia campaign book) - Whole lot of Lava box (new campaign book and miniatures) - Poison Dragon box (KS exclusive boss and tile) Accept Paypal or IBAN with BIC. Bank transfer is preferred. Private Sale. Game should arrive within the next two weeks- will ship directly afterwards. Any questions just ask. You will only pay the shipping you want and need.

Pre-order for one Kickstarter edition with all of the exclusive figures - see the [url=https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/coolminiornot/arcadia-quest-inferno]kickstarter listing[/url] for everything included. Does not include any optional buys. Will ship in mid-February. Shipping estimate is $20 - $40 based on distance from Detroit, MI.

This is for the complete Hell of Pledge Kickstarter, brand new IN HAND. Domestic shipping is FREE! Shipping to Canada is $100. All other international locations is $150. I ALWAYS combine shipping on multiple purchases at +$1 per item. This purchase includes: Core box Hell of a box (SGs and KS exclusives + printed Fall of Arcadia campaign book) - the Guildmaster box from the original AQ fetches $400+ now!! Whole lot of Lava box (new campaign book and miniatures) Poison Dragon box (KS exclusive boss and tile)

This bundle is a preorder for the KS version of Arcadia Quest Inferno. This includes the following items. I will ship it as soon as I have it in my hands. I received my tracking info already so it should be here soon. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll even throw in the classic guild bag and classic guild tokens. Depending on where you live shipping can be high, the boxes are coming in at 12 and 14 lbs! Just wanted to give a heads up, this is coming from Forest Hill Maryland. I will keep this up here for a few more days before going the way of Ebay, would rather it go to a gamer which is why the price is low. Message me for a quote on shipping. Arcadia Quest Inferno base game Arcadia Quest KS Exclusive Hell of a Box Whole Lotta Lava Arcadia Quest Pets Dragon Bundle (All 3 dragons) and the Poison Dragon Hellfire Token Pack Anvil and Valma Mamba and Rosh Viola and Crash Yona and Kuruk Pet Pack 1 and 2 Inferno Guild Bags Plastic Token Pack Also includes the KS exclusives Hoshi, Cerby, Nina, and Hilda!
